Description:

Ludwig had too much to drink last night, and now he's incapacitated with a terrible hangover. As his loyal friend, it's up to you to make breakfast for the gang. But be careful - Coots is on the loose and hiding in dangerous areas around the kitchen.

In this fast-paced and challenging game, you'll take on the role of Ludwig's friend and navigate your way through a messy kitchen, collecting ingredients, cooking up a breakfast, and keeping an eye out for Coots. You'll need to move quickly and think on your feet to avoid Coots getting hurt or worse while also preparing the Hangover Breakfast.

With a fun and quirky art style, Cooking with Coots is sure to delight fans of action-packed cooking games and is a must-play for fans of Ludwig.

So grab your Spatula, sharpen your senses, and get ready to save the day in this hilarious and entertaining adventure.

Controls:

W/A/S/D or Key Arrows = Moving
LMB = Interact
